com.facebook.buck.core.build.distributed.synchronization

Interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpRemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier, RemoteBuildRuleSynchronizer

    public interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
    Used to notify the client of a remote build that a particular rule (or the entire build) has finished.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void signalCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
      Signals that an individual build rule has completed remotely
      void signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild(boolean success)
      Signals that the entire remote build has finished (and in turn all rules within it)
      void signalMostBuildRulesFinished(boolean success)
      Configured threshold percentage of build rules has finished building remotely.
      void signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
      Signals that an individual build rule has started building remotely

    • Method Detail

      • signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule

        void signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Signals that an individual build rule has started building remotely
        Parameters:
        buildTarget -

      • signalCompletionOfBuildRule

        void signalCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Signals that an individual build rule has completed remotely
        Parameters:
        buildTarget -

      • signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild

        void signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild(boolean success)
        Signals that the entire remote build has finished (and in turn all rules within it)
        Parameters:
        success - Indicates whether remote build finished successfully or in a failure.

      • signalMostBuildRulesFinished

        void signalMostBuildRulesFinished(boolean success)
        Configured threshold percentage of build rules has finished building remotely.
        Parameters:
        success - Indicates whether most rules finished successfully or in a failure.
